data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Małopolskie.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Małopolskie, Poland
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Małopolskie, Poland.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Małopolskie, Poland.
data.prayer: Lord, make yourself real to these new families.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Małopolskie, Poland who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Małopolskie.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Jew, Karaite people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Jew, Karaite people.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Małopolskie, Poland to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Małopolskie, Poland to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Spirit, teach the 10,235 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.
